item.description:
All attendees must read, understand and agree to the waiver/liability as outlined by this website

We will be hiking up the Edmands Path to Eisenhower. Across the Crawford path to Mt Monroe, down to Lakes of the Crowds Hut and then reversing direction.
Total distance 10.2 miles
Book Time 8:42
This is an intermediate to an advanced hike. Please know your limit. For further trail descriptions please check out the AMC White Mountain Guide
item.how_to_find_us: WE WILL BE IN A SILVER FOUR DOOR LEGACY
item.name: MT EISEHOWER & MONROE
